lyrics:
Greek
Greek script
Translation



Greek
Ena tsirko xana poula sti nychta ti̱ chara
Kai san proti skini o clown paizei ti zoi
Synergeia, kako, oloi edo zoun se pyreto
Fota kai mousiki, o chronos ginetai stigmi
Clown, clown, eimai o clown
Clown, clown, eimai o clown, hahahaha…
Clown, clown, eimai o clown
Clown, clown, eimai o clown, hahahaha…
Tragoudao, gelo, klaoi kai paramilo
Kano toumpes polles, se mimoumai an thes
M’ oti kano geloun, oloi me cheirokrotoun
Ma pos echo kardia, to xeroun kai ta paidia
Clown, clown, eimai o clown
Clown, clown, eimai o clown, hahahaha…
Clown, clown, eimai o clown
Clown, clown, eimai o clown, hahahaha…
Ki otan tha’rthoun stigmes choris pia theates
Panta ego tha gelo, klaigontas tha tragoudo
Clown, clown, eimai o clown
Clown, clown, eimai o clown, hahahaha…
Clown, clown, eimai o clown
Clown, clown, eimai o clown, hahahaha…
